New Year's Eve 12:00 p.m. - 1:00 a.m
Free entry from 12:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m
bemerkungen:
The Christmas Magic Gendarmenmarkt at the State Opera will take place on the historic Bebelplatz from 2022 to 2024 due to the climate-friendly renovation of the Gendarmenmarkt. Enjoy this historical ambience in the center of Berlin opposite the Humboldt University. Here we welcome our visitors to the usual magical Christmas atmosphere.
The best exhibitors, restaurateurs and artists are looking forward to your visit!

name: Advent bazaar: “Where there is anticipation, Christmas becomes a celebration”
veranstalter:
Albert Schweizer Foundation -
Living & care
Tel.: 030 474 77 345
www.ass-berlin.org
bemerkungen: Look forward to Santa Claus and the three wise men, who will greet you on the foundation grounds. Browse for individual gifts for your loved ones at the numerous market stalls and enjoy hot punch, waffles, pelmeni and much more. An atmospheric stage program, a fire show and great hands-on activities for young and old ensure a pre-Christmas atmosphere. A carousel, a train, a decorated petting zoo and much more will make children's hearts beat faster. Admission is free.

name: Environmental and Christmas market on Sophienstrasse
veranstalter: EVENTS - R. Bielefeldt, Zehdenicker Str. 14, 10119 Berlin
bemerkungen:
Right next to the Hackesche Höfe in one of the oldest streets in Berlin, an extraordinary range of unique designer and artist goods awaits you. The unique concept was honored with first prize in the environmental competition in 1996 and stands out from the city's other Christmas markets.

Free admission!
rss_titel: Environmental and Christmas market on Sophienstrasse

name: Advent in the park
strasse:
Nature Park South Area
S-Bahn station entrance. Priest path
veranstalter:
Green Berlin GmbH
Ullsteinhaus, 3rd floor
Mariendorfer Damm 1
12099 Berlin
oeffnungszeiten:
Saturdays: 3 p.m. - 7 p.m
Sunday: 12 p.m. - 6 p.m
bemerkungen:
Advent magic with Christmas fairy tales and music, sound installations, candle maze, fabulous luminous figures and much more.
On the first two weekends of Advent, the South Terrain Nature Park will be dressed in a Christmassy and fairytale-like garb. Light and sound installations give the park a special, festive atmosphere without the hustle and bustle of classic Christmas markets and with a small selection of stalls.
Entrance fee: 1 euro (from 14 years).
Please note the special opening times.
rss_titel: Advent in the park Natur-Park Schöneberger Südgelände

name: Christmas Market
bemerkungen: Free admission

name: 25. “something different” Christmas market
veranstalter:
Hoher Fläming Nature Park Association e.V.
Tel. 033848 - 60004
www.naturpark-hoher-flaeming.de
bemerkungen: Traditional family Christmas market in the nature park center with lots of hands-on activities, torchlight hike to Rabenstein Castle, garden of lights, open-air cinema, puppet theater, storyteller and much more. Admission is free!

name: 45. Lichtenrader Light Market
veranstalter:
Tempelhof-Schöneberg district office
Contact person: Ms. Frömberg, Tel.: 902 77 34 97
events-pressestelle@ba-ts.berlin.de
bemerkungen:
It is a fixture in the event calendar in pre-Christmas Berlin: the Lichtenrader Lichtermarkt. Around 100 clubs, initiatives and non-profit organizations present their offers at a stand and ring in the Advent season in Tempelhof-Schöneberg.
A wide variety of handicrafts and handicrafts, ceramics, wooden goods, beekeeping products, nostalgic items, handicrafts and toys are offered for sale. Culinary delicacies invite you to linger at the Christmas-decorated stands in the peaceful atmosphere of the former village center. Let yourself be enchanted by the glow of lights and put you in the pre-Christmas mood!
Admission free!

The lights market is not for profit. The surplus income is used for social purposes.

veranstalter: Club of Visionaries - Fish Club GmbH, 030 532 192 29, www.spreedampfer.berlin

From 18 years old
Feel free to come to the hottest winter festival: Naughty Xmas Market at Arena Market Berlin.
Lusty Ice brings you this new Naughty Summer Market. With shows, workshops, kinky art exhibitions and 30+ S+ stands. We're back and bringing you some beautiful new stands and products!
Get some kinky stuff for your lovers, family and friends.
We're open from 1 p.m. to 9 p.m. with mulled wine, sex tips and sexy toys!
Workshops to learn more about sex.
from 18 years
€5 entrance fee

Lehmann's farm
E&E Trade UG (limited liability)
& Co KG

bemerkungen:
A family-oriented Christmas market is taking place for the 28th time on a listed four-sided courtyard, directly opposite the village church on the romantic village meadow. The focus is on handicrafts and unusual gift ideas.
A stage program, a storyteller as well as pony rides and the farm's animals round off the experience with free admission.

name: Italian Street Food Festival - Christmas Klimbim Edition
veranstalter: Club of Visionaries - Fish Club GmbH, 030 532 192 29, www.spreedampfer.berlin
bemerkungen:
Christmas is getting closer and closer and so is the *Italian Street Food Festival – Christmas Klimbim Edition*, which will be back in Berlin this year on Friday 8th, Saturday 9th and Sunday 10th December at the Arena Market.

It's the perfect time to taste delicious Italian specialties, discover typical products from the Italian Christmas tradition, get inspiration for Christmas gifts for your loved ones, meet up with friends over a glass of steaming mulled wine around the campfire and surround yourself with a magical and happy atmosphere.

Everything 100% Italian verified.

And this year there is big news: on the night between Friday 8th and Saturday 9th December we will open the market with a big all-Italian party with a DJ set and special drinks. Admission is €4. Children under 12 years of age enter free!
rss_titel: Italian Street Food Festival - Christmas Klimbim Edition

name: Hennigsdorf Christmas market
veranstalter:
City of Henningsdorf
Rathausplatz 1
16761 Henningsdorf
Tel.: 03302 877 333
www.hennigsdorf.de
bemerkungen:
Admission free.
Look over the shoulders of the artisans in show workshops, discover unique gifts and handmade works of art for your loved ones, enjoy delicious Christmas treats such as roasted almonds, mulled wine and freshly baked cookies and experience atmospheric music and sounds from the open-air stage at the Christmas market, that captures the spirit of Christmas for you.

The little ones can look forward to joining in, singing along and, above all, baking along in the Christmas bakery.

name: Treptow Christmas Market Am Treptower Park
oeffnungszeiten:
Friday 2:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m

name: Winter magic in Advent
oeffnungszeiten:
Friday: 4 p.m. - 10 p.m
Saturday: 12 p.m. – 10 p.m
Sunday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m
bemerkungen: Wendenschloss lido, free entry, various Christmas stands spoil you with sweet and savory delicacies. Hot mulled wine variations and punch around the campfire, various showmen sell their cabaret. Curling, winter games, Christmas karaoke, mulled wine raft trips and other events
